title: The No. 1 mistake people make on dating profiles: It's 'one of the biggest red flags,' says chief dating expert
description: If a bio says "don't contact me if" or "I don't want to meet anyone who likes...," it usually belongs to a person who is not in a good headspace for dating.

title: Disney delays Avatar, Marvel and Star Wars movies as it shuffles releases
description: Disney reorganized its movie release calendar, pushing back various installments in the Avatar, Avengers, and Star Wars franchises.

title: Google's return-to-office crackdown gets backlash from some employees: 'Check my work, not my badge'
description: Google's latest effort to make sure that employees are in the office is getting criticized by some staffers, who say they're being treated like schoolchildren.

title: Netflix is opening its first-ever restaurant featuring food from 'Chef's Table' and 'Iron Chef' stars
description: Diners will need to put down a $25 non-refundable deposit to snag a reservation.

title: AMD reveals new A.I. chip to challenge Nvidia's dominance
description: AMD said its forthcoming most-advanced GPU for AI, the MI300X, will start shipping to some customers later this year, the company said on Tuesday.

title: Men must be more involved in gender equality at work, Yale lecturer says: 5 ways to start
description: Allyship is essential to fostering an inclusive, welcoming and equitable office culture, says Joanne Lipman, a lecturer at Yale University.

title: The message top corporate CFOs are sending directly to Fed presidents: Don't pause. Just stop
description: Chief financial officers at major corporations have been telling Federal Reserve presidents that it is time to stop interest rate hikes, not simply pause them.

title: Google challenges OpenAI's calls for government A.I. czar
description: The two U.S. leaders in artificial intelligence have opposing ideas about how it should be regulated by the government, a new filing reveals.

title: Climate change has fueled larger wildfires in California, scientists say
description: Scientists estimate the area burned during an average summer could rise as much as 50% by 2050 as hotter and drier conditions intensify California wildfires.

title: Here's the inflation breakdown for May 2023, in one chart
description: The consumer price index rose at its slowest pace in two years in May, the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics said Tuesday.

title: What does it take to be wealthy? Well-being is a more important measure than money or assets, survey finds
description: A new Charles Schwab survey finds well-being, not money, has become the leading measure of wealth for most adults today.

title: Overstock.com bids $21.5 million for Bed Bath & Beyond intellectual property assets
description: Online retailer Overstock.com's $21.5 million bid for Bed Bath & Beyond's intellectual property will set the floor for a bankruptcy-run auction.

title: NHL's Ottawa Senators reach deal with Toronto billionaire Michael Andlauer for record price
description: Toronto billionaire Michal Andlauer has agreed to acquire the NHL's Ottawa Senators.

title: Saudi Arabia's PGA merger is likely just the beginning for the kingdom when it comes to pro sports investments
description: The controversial mega merger between the PGA Tour and Saudi Arabia's LIV Golf is just one step in the kingdom's pursuit of big-name sports.

title: 'Aggressive' China cyberattacks are the 'defining threat' of our time, top U.S. cyber official says
description: Chinese hackers could threaten critical pipelines and transport infrastructure in the event of open conflict, CISA director Jen Easterly warned.

title: Inflation rose at a 4% annual rate in May, the lowest in 2 years
description: The consumer price index was expected to rise 0.1% in May, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

title: The whole world wants A.I. — and the market will deliver, Sam Altman says
description: "We're going to make models more efficient. We're going to make way more chips," said OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in Singapore.

title: A Nvidia-backed platform that turns text into A.I.-generated avatars boosts valuation to $1 billion
description: Artificial intelligence-based video generation platform Synthesia has raised $90 million from investors including Nvidia, the company told CNBC exclusively.

title: Alphabet-backed U.K. payment firm GoCardless to cut 15% of headcount
description: The layoffs are part of broader plans for the company to lower its costs by 15%.

title: Paul McCartney says A.I. got John Lennon's voice on 'last Beatles record'
description: "We were able to take John's voice and get it pure through this AI, so that then we could mix the record as you would normally do," McCartney said.

title: UK short-term borrowing costs shoot past 'mini-budget' crisis levels on strong labor data
description: The two-year gilt yield hit its highest level since late August 2008.

title: Shares of Manchester United briefly pop 16% after Qatar media hints at takeover bid ‘success'
description: Qatari media suggested Sheikh Jassim bin Hamad al-Thani was likely to be successful with his takeover bid.

title: Flush with cash, the Middle East is ramping up investment in soccer as a soft power push
description: Manchester City's win, heavily backed by UAE money, comes as Saudi Arabia and Qatar look to ramp up their investment in soccer.

title: Toyota shares surge 5% after announcing plans for next-gen battery EVs
description: This unit, named BEV Factory, aims to roll out its "next generation battery EVs in 2026"

title: Europe wants to use Russia's assets to pay for Ukraine's reconstruction — here's how it might work
description: The EU is getting closer to having a detailed plan on how to use frozen Russian assets to pay for the reconstruction of Ukraine, a senior official told CNBC.

title: The ‘breakout travel trend’ of the decade: What to know about expedition cruising
description: Expedition cruises are often smaller, focus on less-visited or harder to reach destinations, and have onboard specialists to educate passengers.

title: China's yuan weakens after the central bank cuts a key short-term rate
description: The People's Bank of China cut its 7-day reverse repo rate for the first time since August.

title: Biden Acting Labor Secretary Julie Su engaged in tense West Coast port contract negotiations
description: Biden Acting Labor Secretary Julie Su was the top labor official in California. Now she's attempting to help broker a deal to avert a West Coast port crisis.

title: The scarcity of water is emerging as a global economic threat. With China and India looking the most impacted
description: Global fresh water demand is expected to outstrip supply by 40% to 50% by 2030

title: Chocolate is set to get more expensive as cocoa prices soar to seven-year highs
description: Chocolate lovers are up for a bitter disclosure: prices of their favorite snack are about to rise further on the back of elevated cocoa prices.
